ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dchrval.g | |- G = ( DChr ` N ) |
| 2 |  | dchrval.z | |- Z = ( Z/nZ ` N ) |
| 3 |  | dchrval.b | |- B = ( Base ` Z ) |
| 4 |  | dchrval.u | |- U = ( Unit ` Z ) |
| 5 |  | dchrval.n | |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) |
| 6 |  | dchrbas.b | |- D = ( Base ` G ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_dchrbas | |- ( ph -> D = { x e. ( ( mulGrp ` Z ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) ) | ( ( B \ U ) X. { 0 } ) C_ x } ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( ph -> ( X e. D <-> X e. { x e. ( ( mulGrp ` Z ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) ) | ( ( B \ U ) X. { 0 } ) C_ x } ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_sseq2 | |- ( x = X -> ( ( ( B \ U ) X. { 0 } ) C_ x <-> ( ( B \ U ) X. { 0 } ) C_ X ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_elrab | |- ( X e. { x e. ( ( mulGrp ` Z ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) ) | ( ( B \ U ) X. { 0 } ) C_ x } <-> ( X e. ( ( mulGrp ` Z ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) ) /\ ( ( B \ U ) X. { 0 } ) C_ X ) ) |
| 11 | 8, 10 | #P_syl6bb | |- ( ph -> ( X e. D <-> ( X e. ( ( mulGrp ` Z ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` CCfld ) ) /\ ( ( B \ U ) X. { 0 } ) C_ X ) ) ) |
